page.title: 17Local Government,Wishford.
page.content: { {Wishford}and{Stapleford}both have {Parish Councils}and their representative on the{Salisbury {District Council}is Mr.J.Ryan,Liberal who also repesents the Langfords which lie outside the area. There is also one councillor representing Wishford,Stapleford and the Langfords on the{Wiltshire County {Council}and at the moment this is Mr.Ryan,Conservative. The area lies in the{Constituency of {Salisbury}in the{Electoral Division of {Shrewton.The District Ward}is Wylye, and the{Polling Districts}are Stapleford,Gt.Wishford,and Langfords. The elected{M.P.}is Mr.R.Key, Conservative.
